items.sentence: You should tell Tom Mary doesn\'t have to do that.
We\'re going to do that the same way we always do.
We\'re now about a hundred miles away from Boston.
We\'ve given careful thought to both alternatives.
Tell me why you were absent from school yesterday.
At the moment, there isn\'t anybody in the office.
I\'ve already told everyone I\'m moving to Boston.
Mary is very beautiful, but she\'s not very smart.
The problem was I didn\'t know Tom couldn\'t swim.
Does everyone think it was me who stole the money?
